mapper.insert: insert into user_info(USER_ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, GENDER) values(#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth},#{gender} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_info where USER_ID = #{userId}
select * from user_info where USER_ID = #{userId} and PASSWORD = #{password}
select * from user_info where USER_ID=#{userId} and PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from user_info where USER_ID=#{userId} and PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.select: select PASSWORD from user_info where USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user_info set PASSWORD = #{password} where USER_ID = #{userId}
